src:
Briljantni Micić, odlični Milutinov i Micov
07 Nov 2019, 23:50 by Zile
Odigrano je prvih pet utakmica 7. kola Evrolige, a osim Reala pobede su ostvarili Himki, Efes, Makabi i Milano.
Efes je u Pireju izgubio prvu i treću četvrtinu, ali je razlika koju je ostvario u drugoj i četvrtoj bila sasvim dovoljna za ubedljiv trijumf. Vasilije Micić je odigrao još jedan sjajan meč, za 35 minuta ubacio je 27 poena uz 2 skoka, 5 asistencija i 2 ukradene lopte. Šutirao je 6/9 za 2 i 5/6 za 3 poena i ostvario indeks korisnosti 27. Pratio ga je Šejn Larkin koji je sa 24 poena i indeksom 31 bio MVP ovog meča. Kod Olimpijakosa Pol je bio najefikasniji sa 15 poena, Printezis jee ubacio 14, a Milutinov 10 poena uz 13 skokova bez promašaja iz igre (5/5).
Posle poraza u Beogradu Himki je nastavio sa dobrim igrama. Predvođen Bukerom (20 poena) i Švedom (19 poena) slavio je u St. Peterburgu, a dvocifren u ovoj pobedi bioje i Gil sa 12 poena. Stefan Jović je za 22 minuta imao učinak od 5 poena, 3 skoka, 3 asistencije i 4 ukradene lopte. Kod Zenita ubedljivo najbolji bio je Holins sa 25poena.
Peti vezani trijumf ostvario je Makabi koji je bio ubedljiv protiv Albe. Petoricu veoma raspoloženih igrača imao je klub iz Tel Aviva – Dibartolomeo je postigao 19,Vilbekin 16, Blek 13, Dorsi 12 i Kaspi 10 poena. Kod Albe Siva i Kavana po 14 poena, dok je Gidraitis meč završio sa 12 poena.
Seriju pobeda nastavila je i Olimpija iz Milana. Italijani su u prvih sedam kola poraženi samo jednom, a večeras je oružje pred njima položila Baskonija. Dela Vale je postigao 15 poena, Rodrigez 13, a Vladimir Micov 12. Igrao je i Nemanja Nedović koji je za 14 minuta ubacio 2 poena. Kod gostiju Stauskas 15 poena, Henri i Fol po 13, a Šengelija 12 poena.
Olimpijakos – Anadolu Efes 67:86 (24:21, 11:32, 23:14, 9:19)Zenit – Himki 73:87 (28:28, 15:24, 17:16 13:19)Makabi – Alba 104:78 (21:19, 31:18, 31:18, 21:23)Olimpija MIlano – Baskonija 81:74 (14:19, 26:15, 16:19, 25:21)

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Brilliant Micic, great Milutinov and Micov
07 Nov 2019, 22:50 by Zile
The first five games of the Euroleague Round 7 were played, and in addition to Real Madrid, Khimki, Ephesus, Maccabi and Milan won.
Ephesus lost the first and third quarters in Piraeus, but the difference he made in the second and fourth was quite sufficient for a convincing triumph. Vasilije Micic played another great match, in 35 minutes he scored 27 points with 2 rebounds, 5 assists and 2 steals. He kicked 6/9 for 2 and 5/6 for 3 points and achieved a utility index of 27. He was followed by Shane Larkin who, with 24 points and index 31, was the MVP of this match. With Olympiakos, Paul was most efficient with 15 points, Printezis scored 14 and Milutin's 10 points with 13 rebounds without a miss (5/5).
After the defeat in Belgrade, Khimki continued with good games. Led by Booker (20 points) and Sweden (19 points) celebrated at St. Petersburg, and double in this win was Bio and Gil with 12 points. Stefan Jovic had 5 points, 3 rebounds, 3 assists and 4 steals in 22 minutes. With Zenit by far the best was Hollins with 25 points.
The fifth tied triumph was achieved by Maccabi who was convincing against Alba. Five highly placed players had a Tel Aviv club - Dibartolomeo scored 19, Wilbeck 16, Black 13, Dorsi 12 and Caspi 10 points. Alba Gray and Cavanaugh each scored 14 points, while Gidraitis finished the match with 12 points.
The Olympics from Milan continued their series of victories. The Italians were defeated only once in the first seven rounds, and tonight the weapons were laid by Basque country. Dela Vale scored 15 points, Rodriguez 13, and Vladimir Micov 12. He also played Nemanja Nedovic, who scored 2 points in 14 minutes. For guests Stauskas 15 points, Henry and Fol each 13, and Schengelia 12 points.
Olympiakos - Anadolu Ephesus 67:86 (24:21, 11:32, 23:14, 9:19) Zenit - Khimki 73:87 (28:28, 15:24, 17:16 13:19) Maccabi - Alba 104 : 78 (21:19, 31:18, 31:18, 21:23) Olympia Milan - Basque Country 81:74 (14:19, 26:15, 16:19, 25:21)
